channel.title: Lotus Docs Exemple de Site
channel.description: Recent content on Lotus Docs Exemple de Site

item.title: Démarrage rapide
item.description: Créer un nouveau contenu linkNavigate to the root of your Hugo project and use the hugo new command to create a file in the content/docs directory: hugo new docs/example-page.md This will create a markdown file named example-page.md with the following default front matter: +++ title = "Example Page" description = "" icon = "article" date = "2023-05-22T00:27:57+01:00" lastmod = "2023-05-22T00:27:57+01:00" draft = false toc = true weight = 999 +++ Modify the options to suit your needs.

item.title: Code
item.description: Code Block Examples linkCode block language examples Go link package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") } HTML link <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <body> <h1>My First Heading</h1> <p>My first paragraph.</p> </body> </html> Markdown link # H1 heading **Some bold text** *Italic text example*
